title: Sketchbook Folio, Dark Choppy Ocean and Tall Cliffs under a Dramatic Sky, 1870–85
title_raw: Dark Choppy Ocean and Tall Cliffs under a Dramatic Sky
medium: graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Dark ocean with large, choppy waves across the foreground. Large, rocky cliffs at left middleground and extending back, fading out at right-center distance. In sky above cliffs, at left-center, light dramatically breaking through clouds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, Dark Choppy Ocean and Tall Cliffs under a Dramatic Sky, 1870–85;  William Trost Richards (American, 1833–1905); USA; graphite on cream wove paper, bound; 10 x 15.8 cm (3 15/16 x 6 1/4 in.), irregular
Sheet: 12.8 x 19.2 cm (5 1/16 x 7 9/16 in.); Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest; 1953-179-86-34
